content: Set up local Spark testing environment with minimal dependencies
Create mock AWS services (S3, RDS, DynamoDB, Glue) for local testing
Create test configuration with local paths instead of S3 paths
Set up sample test data to validate ETL logic
Create test runner script that can execute the ETL locally
Modify script to use test S3 path (delta/test-2025-08-01) and limit to 20 tables
